note:
I'm a coder, builder of worlds. I have too many prototypes and too few finished games. Often slow finding my thoughts and verbalising them.

I'm transgender woman and still trying to figure out things. I post about most inane prolems from time to time.

My DMs are open if you need to talk with someone. Let's be be kind and treat each other with respect. You're worth it and so am I.

Follow requests are welcome.

Tell me about your cool project.

fields.name: proverb
fields.value: Non est ad astra mollis e terris via
